nodes.text: Raphael Mar-Shayal was a male pilot of the Alliance to Restore the Republic who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, Mar-Shayal hid from the Galactic Empire on the slopes of Mount Chaolt, a volcano on the planet Lok. Mar-Shayal was suspected by then Colonel Maximilian Veers as being involved in the destruction of the Death Star. In light of this, Colonel Veers tasked an Imperial operative with tracking down and killing Mar-Shayal, alongside two other suspects, Aramis Kariya and Fen Corandel.

Raphael Mar-Shayal was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
